q: in Detroit: that the city and Chrysler had a universal story screaming to be told. "The story of Detroit should be written by, and come from people of Detroit," Stables said. Other people don't get to define who you are. Once they latched onto the tagline "imported from Detroit," the story took on a life of its own.
